name: Star Roll
description:
Open source

You can download all sources here under licence GNU LGPLv2.1: https://framagit.org/Elanndelh/star-roll


Controls:

Left click to move forward and right click to move backward.
Don't be touched by meteors or burning walls!

Hello explorers!

We are two developers from France who challenged themselves to make a game on a very Low rez (in a little less than two days!)
This game is about a space cinnamon roll which wants to be the prettiest cinnamon roll by collecting stars to decorate itself. 
Space is full of danger for a cute cake, and your mission, if you accept it, is to guide it through.

.
